SEARCH
Module PIXL.POS
Package teampixl.com.pixlpos.database

Class DataStore

java.lang.Object
teampixl.com.pixlpos.database.DataStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIngredientsStore, IMenuItemStore, IOrderStore, IStockStore, IUserStore
public class DataStore extends Object implements IUserStore, IMenuItemStore, IOrderStore, IIngredientsStore, IStockStore
This class is responsible for managing the data in the application. It acts as a facade for the database operations. It provides methods for adding, updating, and removing data from the database. This is the application programming interface (API) for the database. It implements the IUserStore, IMenuItemStore, IOrderStore, IIngredientsStore, and IStockStore interfaces.
